title: Support Services by B2X: Ticket ID - GL0074532 - Google Pixel
content:
Picked up by B2X on 9th July 2019 & Today is 2nd Aug 2019 and I haven't received my handset because Google/B2X engineers are unable to diagnose battery issue.

 I have been using Pixel series since last 3+ years but I will Never buy Google Pixel after this super experience..

Best of Luck.
